member.name: P:Axiom.RenderSystems.DirectX9.D3DGpuProgram.ExternalMicrocode
member.summary: Gets/Sets a prepared chunk of microcode to use during Load rather than loading from file or a string.
member.remarks: This is used by the HLSL compiler once it compiles down to low level microcode, which can then be loaded into a low level GPU program.
